```{r}

# 

# Import the confounds.tsv file
confounds <- rio::import("/Users/brendancullen/Desktop/sub-REV001_ses-wave1_task-sst_acq-1_run-01_bold_confounds.tsv")

# Select only the motion paramters of interest
confounds <- dplyr::select(confounds, c(X, Y, Z, RotX, RotY, RotZ, stdDVARS, FramewiseDisplacement))

# Export the selected parameters to a .txt file
write.table(confounds, "/Users/brendancullen/Desktop/sub-REV001_ses-wave1_task-sst_acq-1_run-01_bold_confounds.txt", sep = "\t", row.names = FALSE, col.names = FALSE)
```
